content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to the real-time information about Wing On's expansion plans. However, historically, Wing On has been focused on expanding its presence in Hong Kong, mainland China, and Macau. Over the years, it has opened several new stores and expanded its e-commerce operations in these regions with a wide range of products and services. 

While it is not clear whether Wing On has any plans to expand globally, it continues to innovate and invest in technology to stay competitive in the retail industry. If the company does decide to expand to other markets in the future, it will likely draw on its established brand reputation, unique products, and innovative shopping experiences to attract customers.
